text: Caroline Langat Thoruwa is a Kenyan chemist. She is a professor of chemistry at Kenyatta University, and the director of its Nairobi City satellite campus. Langat Thoruwa is also the chairperson of African Women in Science and Engineering, a member of the board of the International Network Women Engineers & Scientists, and a member of the technical committee of ACTIL Knowledge Hub. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Kenyan chemists Category:Kenyan women chemists Category:21st-century chemists Category:21st-century women scientists
title: Caroline Langat Thoruwa
